title: Søren Lyng
text:
Søren Lyng Christiansen (born 8 July 1966) is a Danish former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who won the <a href="Danish%20Superliga%201992-93">1993</a> <a href="Danish%20football%20championship">Danish football championship</a> with <a href="F.C.%20Copenhagen">F.C. Copenhagen</a> and made two international caps.
Honours.
Club
